name: Revenge of the Hi Ground: Fly Saber Battles
name_original: Revenge of the Hi Ground: Fly Saber Battles
description:
It seems that sounds may not work on firefox, please use chrome.

Made in 3 hours for Trijam #53: I have the high ground

And Wowie Jam 2.0!: Intentional Bugs

The Prequel Fight nobody asked for.

Infinite runner, but upwards.

This game really makes you feel like lord of the flies.

Colliding with a large platform will schloop you up to the top, an intentional bug that increases gameplay.

Also you are a bug. intentionally.

Created on stream at https://twitch.tv/bdotjs
